actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill authorizing the establishment of a customs fund for use in the renovation, expansion, and construction of customs port facilities located on state or municipal marine terminal property at United States ports.

summary.text: Establishes a national fund for the renovation, expansion, and construction of customs port facilities located on State or municipal marine terminal property. Designates one percent of the customs import revenues at ports from the preceding fiscal year for this fund. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to administer this fund to individual customs districts on a pro rata basis.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the establishment of a customs fund for use in the renovation, expansion, and construction of customs port facilities located on state or municipal marine terminal property at United States ports.
